title: Gd, after working customer service at walmart for 6 months i've decided i give NO fucks.
body:
Literally the shit people say is so god awful that i actually don't care. Like i have bigass dudes with beards that make them look like zeus themself and i'm not even scared anymore when they talk smack or try to be a smartass. It literally doesn't fade me. I just think about how stupid they are, and stabbing them in the side. Repeatedly.

Like people say things that blow my mind. They're so stupid that i don't think they can actually be said. 

Example-

(i'm at cigarette counter)

(Big guy comes threw my line, this dude is huge and looks brutal and tough as hell. balls the size of meteors)

Him- can i get a pack of newport box  100's.

Me- Sure! (grabs them) (tells him total)

Him- (pays)

Me- (gets him his change and receipt) have a good one (hands both to him with receipt)

Him- I don't need the receipt, dude. I can't return these.


Me (what i ACTUALLY said) - have a good one (smile) (he walks away, says nothing)


Me (what i'm GOING to be saying from now on) - Yeah, i'm a cashier so it's my job to give the receipt back in general. I think there's this thing called.. uhh wow! A garbage can! It's a new invention and i believe it's a receptical for trash. Have a good one!
